Authors:
Li-Hong Han, Xue-Lian Tian, Ting Guo, DongQin Dai,
Hong-Long Chu, R. H. Yang, Wen Qian, Chao Liu, Li-Zhou Tang
Title:
A new species of Strobilomyces from eastern China with
morphology and phylogeny
Abstract:
A new species of Strobilomyces is described and
illustrated from eastern China, based on morphological and molecular
evidence. Strobilomyces huangshanensis is characterized by the black,
thin, appressed pyramidal scales on the pileus, black tomentose scales
on the stipe, small pores of the tube, reticulate basidiospores with
medium-sized meshes, light rusty red discoloration of the context on
exposure and subtropical distribution. Morphological details and line
drawings for the new species is provided.
